name: SENRAN KAGURA Burst Re:Newal - Playable Character Kagura, Naraku & Ryoki Set
detailed_description:
This DLC pack includes the following items:
・Playable Characters
Kagura
Naraku
Ryōki

・Outfits
Kagura’s Dress
Kagura’s Skirt
Punk Outfit
Ryōki’s One-Piece Dress
True Kagura’s Dress
True Kagura’s Skirt
Naraku’s Parka
Naraku’s Parka (No Hood)
Ryōki’s Outfit

・Lingerie
‘Classic’ Series
‘Monochrome’ Series
‘Sister Blue’ Series

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
